New Records: Glenn Maxwell scored the fastest century in an ODI World Cup, reaching 100 in just 40 balls.
Bas de Leede delivered the most expensive over in men's ODI history, conceding 43 runs in two overs.
Key Match Events: David Warner and Glenn Maxwell scored centuries, with Maxwell's innings being the fastest in a World Cup.
Australia achieved a 309-run victory, the largest margin in an ODI World Cup match.
Post-Match Reflections: Players and coaches reflected on the win, with David Warner and Glenn Maxwell praised for their performances.
